contentList.content: Slashing Resistance (Non-Magical)
You have Resistance to Slashing Damage, and take half as much damage from Non-Magical Slashing attacks.
Piercing Resistance (Non-Magical)
You have Resistance to Piercing Damage, and take half as much damage from Non-Magical Piercing attacks.
